Verses: 1 idukkan Seydhu, Ooththaiyum Azhukkumaayirukkira Nagaraththukku Aiyo!
2 adhu Saththaththukku Sevikodukkavillai; Adhu Kadindhukolludhalai Etrukkollavillai; Adhu Karththarai Nambavillai; Adhu Than Dhevanidaththil Seravillai.

3 adharkulle Irukkira Adhin Adhipadhigal Kerchchikkira Singangal; Adhin Nyaayaadhipadhigal Saayankaalaththil Purappadugiradhum Vidiyarkaalamattum Oru Elumbaiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaadhadhumaana Onaaigal.
4 adhin Theerkkadharisigal Veenperumaiyum Vanjagamumullavargal; Adhin Aasaariyargal Parisuththa Sthalaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakki, Vedhaththukku Aniyaayancheydhaargal.
5 adharkul Irukkira Karththar Needhiyullavar; Avar Aniyaayancheyvadhillai; Avar Kuraivillaamal, Kaalaidhorum Thammudaiya Nyaayaththai Vilangappannugiraar; Aniyaayakkaarano Vetkam Ariyaan.

6 jaadhigalai Sangariththen; Avargal Thurugangal Paazhaayina; Avargaludaiya Veedhigalai Oruvarum Kadandhupogaadhapadikkup Paazhaakkinen; Avargaludaiya Pattanangal Manusharillaadhapadikkum Kudiyillaadhapadikkum Avaandharaiyaayina.

7 un Vaasasthalam Nirmoolamaagaadhapadikku Nee Enakku Bayandhu, Kadindhukolludhalai Etrukkol Endren; Naan Avargalai Eppadi Dhandiththaalum, Avargal Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu Thangal Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Kedaakkinaargal.

8 aagaiyaal Naan Kollaiyaada Ezhumbum Naalmattum Enakkuk Kaaththirungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; En Sinamaagiya Ukkirakobaththaiyellaam Avargalmel Soriyumpadi Jaadhigalai Serkkavum, Raajyangalaik Koottavum Naan Theermaanampanninen; Boomiyellaam En Erichchalin Akkiniyinaal Azhiyum.
9 appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukondu, Orumanappattu Avarukku Aaraadhanai Seyyumpadikku, Naan Avargal Baashaiyai Suththamaana Baashaiyaaga Maarappannuven.
10 eththiyoppiyaavin Nadhigalukku Akkaraiyilirundhu Ennidaththil Vinnappampannugiravargalaagiya Sidharadikkappattavargalin Kumaaraththiyaanaval Enakkuk Kaanikkai Konduvaruvaal,

11 enakku Virodhamaaith Dhrogampanni, Nee Seydha Un Ellaak Kiriyaigalinimiththamum Annaalile Vetkappadaadhiruppaai; Appozhudhu Naan Un Perumaiyaikkuriththuk Kalikoorndhavargalai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkividuven; Nee Ini En Parisuththa Parvadhaththil Agangaarankollamaattaai.
12 un Naduvil Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaana Janaththai Meedhiyaaga Vaippen; Avargal Karththarudaiya Naamaththinmel Nambikkaiyaayiruppaargal.

13 isravelil Meedhiyaanavargal Aniyaayancheyvadhillai; Avargal Poi Pesuvadhumillai; Vanjaganaavu Avargal Vaayil Kandupidikkappaduvadhumillai; Avargal Thangalai Bayappaduththuvaarillaamal Pusiththup Paduththukkolvaargal.
14 seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Gembeeriththuppaadu; Isravelare, Aarppariyungal; Erusalem Kumaaraththiye, Nee Muzhuirudhayaththodum Magizhndhu Kalikooru.
15 karththar Un Aakkinaigalai Agatri, Un Saththurukkalai Vilakkinaar; Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Karththar Un Naduvile Irukkiraar; Inith Theengaik Kaanaadhiruppaai.
16 annaalile Erusalemaip Paarththu, Bayappadaadhe Endrum, Seeyonaip Paarththu Un Kaigalaith Thalaravidaadhe Endrum Sollappadum.

17 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Naduvil Irukkiraar; Avar Vallamaiyullavar, Avar Ratchippaar; Avar Unperil Sandhoshamaai Magizhndhu, Thammudaiya Anbinimiththam Amarndhiruppaar; Avar Unperil Gembeeramaaik Kalikooruvaar (magizhvudan Paaduvaar).
18 un Sabaiyin Manusharaayirundhu Pandigai Aasarippillaamaiyaal Undaana Nindhaiyinimiththam Sanjalappattavargalai Naan Egamaaik Koottikkolluven.

19 idho, Akkaalaththile Unnai Sirumaippaduththina Yaavaraiyum Dhandippen; Nondiyaanavanai Ratchiththu, Thallundavanai Serththukkolluven; Avargal Vetkam Anubaviththa Sagala Dhesangalilum Avargalukkup Pugazhchchiyum Keerththiyum Undaaga Seyven.

20 akkaalaththile Ungalaik Koottikkonduvaruven, Akkaalaththile Ungalai Serththukkolven; Ungal Kankaana Naan Ungal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppumpodhu, Boomiyilulla Sagala Janangalukkullum Naan Ungalaik Keerththiyum Pugazhchchiyumaaga Vaippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
